product.title: Steel Touring Roof Rack - 87x49in - FJ60, FJ62, FJ80, BJ 1980-1998
product.body_html:
Fits Toyota Land Cruiser - 8/1980 - 1998 FJ60, FJ62, FJ80, BJ & HJ

ARB Roof Racks & Roof Bars

A roof rack is a valuable and versatile accessory for many touring vehicles, and without one some trips would just not be possible.

It’s the obvious place for lightweight, bulky items that are difficult to fit in the cabin of the vehicle. And with additional accessories now available, such as waterproof bags, you don’t have to worry about your gear being exposed to the elements while travelling.

ARB offers a range of different roof rack configurations, in both steel and aluminium to provide additional storage space. Additionally, ARB also offers Thule and Rhino roof bars and accessories for a wide range of vehicles.

This item is shipped LTL Freight and is eligible for FREE SHIPPING to any shop/business address that has a dock. Unfortunately, freight companies consider and house, apartment or any other dwelling place where people also reside as a residential address.  


A $100 surcharge will be added for any residential delivery.
